timeline.message:
ManualSynthesizer/ManualTagger: reduce memory overhead

don't waste space on arrays of length 1

timeline.bodyText: Could you please add the LGPL license header here? (see other .java files)
timeline.author: danielnaber

revised_code.chunk:
